relax_eyes.title: Relax your eyes
relax_eyes.description: Look away from your screen and focus on a distant object for 20 seconds

check_fingers.title: Check your fingers
check_fingers.description: Stretch and wiggle your fingers to prevent tension and strain

relax_arms.title: Relax your arms
relax_arms.description: Drop your arms to your sides and shake them gently

stretch_legs.title: Stretch your legs
stretch_legs.description: Stand up and take a few steps to improve circulation

fix_posture.title: Fix your posture
fix_posture.description: Sit up straight, align your back, and relax your shoulders

have_water.title: Have some water
have_water.description: Take a sip of water to stay hydrated

breathe.title: Breathe for a moment
breathe.description: Take 3 deep breaths, inhaling through your nose and exhaling slowly

ui.sentinel_description: Protect your focus with gentle reminders.
ui.info_message: Sentinel helps you protect focus and health with simple break reminders while you work.
